body.name: Joseph Joseph Slice & Sharpen 6" Chef's Knive and 3.5" Paring Knife with Sharpening Protective Sheaths, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 37 mins
features: All-in-one knife and sharpener set - Conveniently sharpen knives just before use
Integrated high-quality ceramic sharpener in knife sheath, suitable for most types of stainless-steel blade. Not suitable for serrated or ceramic blades
Non-slip base on the sheath for safe sharpening
The knives are made of high-quality stainless-steel and have non-stick, silicone-coated blades and comfortable, ergonomic handles
Sheath helps to protect knife when being stored
body.description: This all-in-one knife has an integrated ceramic sharpener built into the protective sheath, allowing you to quickly and easily sharpen your blades just before you use them. A non-slip rubber base ensures the sheath stays securely in place when sharpening. The knife is made of high-quality stainless-steel and has a non-stick, silicone-coated blade and a comfortable, ergonomic handle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Slice&Sharpen Knives: Silicone-Coated Knives with Sharpening Sheaths These all-in-one knives have non-stick, silicone-coated blades and come with their own protective storage sheath which includes a built-in ceramic sharpener. This allows you to sharpen the blades just before use, which is both safer and more efficient. Sheaths have a non-slip base for safe sharpening. Knives - wash and dry by hand. Sheaths - wipe clean with a damp cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these
reviews.reviewText: I bought these back in Jun 2022 and am finally writing a review in January 2024. These were my first Joseph Joseph purchase, after admiring and drooling over so many of their products over the years. I live alone, don't cook a whole lot but can't stand blunt knives. Before I purchased these, I was on the hunt for a new chef's knife (I had a basic one I'd purchased from Amazon, it was 8" vs the 6" in the JJ set) and a knife sharpener since I'd never owned one and let my existing knife get pretty dull. That knife was honestly just kinda too big for me, and I felt a little uncomfortable wielding it around. Plus it was heavy. I LOVE my Joseph Joseph set; they're perfect for me for a number of reasons. One, I love that I am taking care of these knives. Because they have the sheath that stores them, I find myself cleaning them quicker and drying them off sooner, so I can run the blade thru the shapener and put it back in the sheath. I definitely wouldn't want to put it in there if it were still kind of dirty or wet. So, these just help me take care of the knives more. Second - they have a built in sharpener! Not sure what else to add to that. Again, I'm not a pro chef and I don't cook a ton, maybe twice a week - mostly just cutting vegetables and tofu and herbs. But it's SO CONVENIENT to have the shapener right there built into the sheath - no need for a separate tool floating around the drawer.... And at first I wondered if it was redundant having two shapeneres - one on each sheath - but after a solid year and a half of using these, I can tell you that no- it's not redundant because each sharpener is proportionate to the knife, and IMP this helps sharpen better - if only because it takes the guess work out of it for me. I love that they're light weight, i love the handle grip, and i Love that they have a nonstick coat. All in all, these are just perfect for me and I'd highly recommend them for anyone. I can see them being excellent for a young adult who moved into their own place for the first time, or someone like me that is tight on space and isn't a gourmet chef and tries to keep things pretty simple. I actually bought a second set shortly after the first set. It's unopened. But i got it as a back up, to potentially give as a gift, or just to have for myself in the future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sharpener, Perfect for Small Spaces
reviews.reviewText: Incredible deal. This product was just what I needed. There's a protective sleeve and part on the tip. The sleeve has a built in sharpener on both so you get two sharpeners. Very good deal. Cuts very well. Don't hesitate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for camping because they have a sheath and were pretty cheap. But I like them so much, I've brought them into my kitchen. Crazy sharp, especially if you sharpen after washing like instructed. Easily slices through tomatoes without crushing them.

reviews.reviewTitle: Magníficos cuchillos, cortan súper bien muy ligeros, me encantaron
reviews.reviewText: Me encantaron para cortar de todo en la cocina los recomiendo

Although they seem good knives, the description is not correct because the blade is stainless steel, not ceramic as it is described. I bought to use them for baby’s first solid foods which needs to be cut via ceramic knife. So it was waste of the time/money for me to buy.

J’ai acheté le set de couteau Slice&Sharpen de Joseph Joseph, qui comprend un couteau d’office et un couteau de chef, avec des aiguiseurs en céramique intégrés aux fourreaux de protection. Je trouve ce produit très astucieux et efficace, car il permet d’aiguiser les lames juste avant de les utiliser, en les glissant dans les fourreaux. Les couteaux sont de bonne qualité, avec des lames en acier inoxydable anti-adhésives et des poignées ergonomiques. Ils sont faciles à nettoyer et à ranger, et ils coupent très bien. Je recommande ce produit à tous ceux qui cherchent des couteaux pratiques et performants. C’est un set indispensable dans ma cuisine.
